channel.title: Getting my server online for peeps
channel.description: please open the doc and you see a picture of my portforward..... How I can get my server on for peeps?? What I dow wrong?? My no-ip works...(k0scape.no-ip.biz) please post my some information how I can get my server on

item.title: Getting my server online for peeps
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

ok…I have portforwarded but I dont know of its good(see doc. for the picture of portforward)
My no-ip works (serverip k0scape.no-ip.biz) (see doc. for a picture of my no-ip)
When I go to moparisthebest.com/serverstatus and register my serverip it says your server is offline-.- but i can still play on it!!
What I dow wrong see my pictures and post some information about it
thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 01:12:40 PM[/size][hr]cmon post some information ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 04:40:00 AM[/size][hr]Why it says your server is offline i can play on it and is my portforward good
post some information please!!

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server online for peeps
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

1.Are You Connected TO The Internet i Know This SOunds Silly But YOu Can Play A Server Without Any COnnection At All!
2.Is The No-Ip You Are Using Case-Sencative?
3.Are YOu Allowing Outbound And Incoming Connections Throgh Your Firewall?
4.Is Your Firewall BLocking It?
5.Are You Using A Router Or Wireless; If So Have You Port Forward?
6.Are YOu Running Server.bat?
